name: Jarl of the Forsaken
oracle_text:
Flash
When Jarl of the Forsaken enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Immersturm Skullcairn
oracle_text:
Immersturm Skullcairn enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Immersturm Skullcairn: It deals 3 damage to target player. That player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: The Bloodsky Massacre
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 2/3 red Demon Berserker creature token with menace.
II — Whenever a Berserker attacks this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
III — Add {R} for each Berserker you control. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps or phases end.

name: Port of Karfell
oracle_text:
Port of Karfell enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{3}{U}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Port of Karfell: Mill four cards, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

name: Demonic Gifts
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."
flavor_text: It began as a flavor on the tongue, like a body morsel of roast boar—but soon the power was a conflagration in her veins.

name: Skull Raid
oracle_text:
Target opponent discards two cards. If fewer than two cards were discarded this way, you draw cards equal to the difference.
Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Draugr Thought-Thief
oracle_text: When Draugr Thought-Thief enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.
flavor_text: The worst part is you won't even remember how much he's taken from you.

name: Blood on the Snow
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all planeswalkers.
Then return a creature or planeswalker card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell.

name: Provoke the Trolls
oracle_text: Provoke the Trolls deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I like burning and pillaging as much as anyone, but sometimes it's just easier to throw a rock and let the trolls do the work."
—Urik, Tuskeri raid leader

name: Icehide Troll
oracle_text: {S}{S}: Icehide Troll gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: A troll's greatest weapon is its ability to emerge unexpectedly from the landscape.

name: "Valley of Lights"
oracle_text:
"Valley of Lights" enters the battlefield tapped.
As "Valley of Lights" enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: "Priest of the Dam"
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice "Priest of the Dam": Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow lands you control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: "Frozen Blessing"
oracle_text: Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures you control, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell. Then draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. ({S} is mana from a snow source.)

name: Fearless Pup
oracle_text:
First strike
Boast — {2}{R}: Fearless Pup gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

name: Frenzied Raider
oracle_text: Whenever you activate a boast ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Frenzied Raider>

name: Horizon Seeker
oracle_text: Boast — {1}{G}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "A five-day climb? Ha! I'll do it in two."

name: Tyrite Sanctum
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Target legendary creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Tyrite Sanctum: Put an indestructible counter on target God.

name: Svella, Ice Shaper
oracle_text:
{3}, {T}: Create a colorless snow artifact token named Icy Manalith with "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
{6}{R}{G}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Graven Lore
oracle_text: Scry X, where is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell. ({S} is mana from a snow source.}
flavor_text: The runes glow beneath the snow, bearing memories of a time when the old gods ruled the realms.

name: The Raven's Warning
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying. You gain 2 life.
II — Whenever one or more creatures you control with flying deal combat damage to a player this turn, look at that player's hand and draw a card.
III — You may put a card you own from outside the game on top of your library.

name: Immersturm Predator
oracle_text:
Flying

Sacrifice another creature: Immersturm Predator gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

name: Cosmos Elixir
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your life total is greater than your starting life total. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The Skoti owe their immortality to the elixir, and the manner of its creation is their most closely guarded secret.

name: Frost Augur
oracle_text: {S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a snow card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: From the barest crack in the ice, she teases forth a swirling, living map of the Cosmos.

name: Battershield Warrior
oracle_text: Boast — {1}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "I need no axe to best these weaklings."

name: Rootless Yew
oracle_text: When Rootless Yew dies, search your library for a creature card with power or toughness 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
